author: La Opinion
title: Ground News - Ederson beat “Dibu” Martínez as Best Goalkeeper in the World in the IFFHS ranking - La Opinion
text:
Summary by La Opinion The world champion goalkeeper with Manchester City was chosen by the International Federation of Football History and Statistics (IFFHS) as the best in the world, over Emiliano Martínez, who won the award at The Best and at the Ballon d'Or gala Share menu More
